articles.title: Rajinikanth shares first photo after brain surgery: ‘Returned home’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Rajinikanth shared a photo as he returned home after undergoing Carotid Artery Revascularization on Friday. The actor’s Annaatthe will release this Diwali.
articles.content: Superstar Rajinikanth, who recently underwent a surgery to restore blood supply to the brain, was discharged from the hospital on Sunday night. The actor has now shared a photo as he returned home af… [+1064 chars]
